entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
